MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 area of Juniper Green. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:01am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:16am on Saturday, 06 February 2021
